newsitem.title: LATVIA: LARGEST APRIL INFLATION RISE IN COMMUNICATIONS.
newsitem.headline: LARGEST APRIL INFLATION RISE IN COMMUNICATIONS.

text.p: The largest rise in prices in April came in the communications sector, which showed price inflation of 16.4 percent, the statistics committee said on Thursday.
The committee earlier said that the monthly inflation rate in April was 0.7 percent for 8.8 percent annual inflation.
It said in a statement that the main cause of the rise in communcations prices was an average increase in telephone charges by 17 percent.
Clothing and footwear showed the next largest price rise at 1.8 percent.
But prices for potatoes fell by 7.1 percent and for eggs by three percent.
